SELECT DISTINCT sso.NAME, oso.sales_org_id, oso.order_number, oso.order_status, oso.delivery_type, oso.pay_date, oso.order_type, oso.invoice_number, m.member_code MEMBER_NUMBER, case when m.member_type = 'COMP' then m.ref_company_en else m.member_name end member_name,
site.NAME AS username, site.phone, site.country_code, site.state_code, site.city_code, site.ADDRESS FROM om_sales_order oso LEFT JOIN mm_member_v m on m.member_id = oso.member_id LEFT JOIN OM_SALES_SITES site ON oso.HEADER_ID = site.HEADER_ID AND SITE.SITE_TYPE = 'SHIP' AND SITE.AUTOSHIP_FLAG = 'N', spm_sales_organization_tl sso, om_sales_line osl
WHERE oso.sales_org_id = sso.sales_org_id and osl.header_id = oso.header_id
and sso.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND oso.order_status IN ('COMP','REFUN') and coalesce(osl.unpick_quantity, 0) > 0 and oso.sales_org_id in (select sura.assign_value from sys_user_role_assign sura where sura.assign_type = 'SALES' and sura.role_id = #{request.roleId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and sura.user_id = #{request.userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
AND Upper(oso.order_number) like concat('%',concat(Upper(#{orderNumber,jdbcType = VARCHAR}),'%'))
and oso.order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
and oso.delivery_type = #{deliveryType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
and to_char(oso.pay_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') >= to_char(#{payDateFrom,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
and to_char(oso.pay_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= to_char(#{payDateTo,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd')
AND Upper(m.member_code) like concat('%',concat(Upper(#{memberNumber,jdbcType = VARCHAR}),'%'))
AND Upper(m.member_name) like concat('%',concat(Upper(#{memberName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}),'%'))
AND Upper(oso.invoice_number) like concat('%',concat(Upper(#{invoiceNumber,jdbcType = VARCHAR}),'%'))
order by oso.sales_org_id,oso.order_number desc

SELECT DISTINCT oso.header_id ,oso.order_number ,coalesce(osl.quantity, 0) quantity ,osl.parent_line_id ,osl.line_id ,osl.item_type ,ipv.organization_id inv_org_id ,(select iotl.NAME from SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_TL iotl where iotl.INV_ORG_ID = ipv.organization_id and iotl.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) NAME ,ib.item_id ,ib.item_number ,ib.item_name ,ib.uom_code ,(select uomtl.name from INV_UNIT_OF_MEASURE_TL uomtl where uomtl.uom_code= ib.uom_code and uomtl.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) uom_name ,coalesce(osl.unpick_quantity, 0) surplusqty ,coalesce(oqv.quantity, 0) inventory ,CASE WHEN coalesce(osl.unpick_quantity, 0) > coalesce(oqv.quantity, 0) THEN coalesce(oqv.quantity, 0) ELSE coalesce(osl.unpick_quantity, 0) END pick_quantity FROM om_sales_line osl LEFT JOIN om_sales_order oso ON oso.header_id = osl.header_id LEFT JOIN inv_item_b ib ON osl.item_id = ib.item_id LEFT JOIN INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V ipv ON ipv.item_id = ib.item_id and ipv.ORGANIZATION_ID= osl.default_inv_org_id and ipv.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y'
left outer join (SELECT ioq.organization_id, ioq.subinventory_id, ioq.location_id, ioq.item_id, ioq.uom_code, SUM(ioq.quantity) quantity FROM inv_onhand_quantity ioq LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_LOT il on il.item_id = ioq.item_id and ioq.organization_id = il.organization_id and ioq.lot_number = il.lot_number LEFT OUTER JOIN inv_item_b iib on iib.item_id = ioq.item_id where ((iib.lot_ctrl_flag = 'Y' and il.deliver_enabled_flag = 'Y') or (iib.lot_ctrl_flag = 'N')) GROUP BY ioq.organization_id, ioq.subinventory_id, ioq.location_id, ioq.item_id,
ioq.uom_code) oqv on oqv.organization_id = ipv.ORGANIZATION_ID and oqv.item_id = ipv.count_item_id
WHERE oso.order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND oso.order_status in ('COMP','CONF','REFUN') AND coalesce(osl.unpick_quantity, 0) > 0 ORDER BY CONCAT(parent_line_id, line_id)

SELECT ss.INV_ORG_ID, siot."NAME" from SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_B siob left outer join SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_TL siot on siob.inv_org_id = siot.inv_org_id and siot.lang=#{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPM_SUPPLY ss, om_sales_order oso WHERE siob.INV_ORG_ID = ss.INV_ORG_ID AND ss.SALES_ORG_ID = oso.SALES_ORG_ID and ss.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'org' and oso.order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT sup.inv_org_id ,siot.name FROM spm_supply sup LEFT JOIN spm_inv_organization_tl siot ON siot.inv_org_id = sup.inv_org_id and siot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V propertyv WHERE sup.supply_type = 'SITE' AND sup.country_code = #{countryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (sup.state_code = #{stateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or sup.state_code IS NULL) AND (sup.city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or sup.city_code IS NULL) AND propertyv.ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND propertyv.ORGANIZATION_ID = sup.INV_ORG_ID UNION SELECT sup.INV_ORG_ID, siot.name FROM SPM_SUPPLY sup LEFT OUTER JOIN SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_TL siot ON siot.inv_org_id = sup.inv_org_id AND siot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V propertyv WHERE sup.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'ORG' AND sup.SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND propertyv.ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND propertyv.ORGANIZATION_ID = sup.INV_ORG_ID

SELECT distinct SS.INV_ORG_ID, siot.name FROM SPM_SUPPLY SS LEFT OUTER JOIN SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_TL siot ON siot.inv_org_id = SS.inv_org_id AND siot.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V propertyv WHERE SS.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'ORG' AND SS.SALES_ORG_ID = #{salesOrgId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND propertyv.ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND propertyv.ORGANIZATION_ID = SS.INV_ORG_ID

SELECT tbl.INV_ORG_ID, tbl.NAME FROM (SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN SS.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'SITE' THEN 1 WHEN SS.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'ORG' THEN 2 END AS PRIORITY, SS.INV_ORG_ID, siot.NAME FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso, SPM_SUPPLY SS, SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_B siob LEFT OUTER JOIN SPM_INV_ORGANIZATION_TL siot ON siob.inv_org_id = siot.inv_org_id WHERE oso.sales_org_id = ss.sales_org_id AND ss.inv_org_id = siob.inv_org_id AND oso.order_number = #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( (SS.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'SITE' AND SS.DEFAULT_FLAG = 'Y') OR (SS.SUPPLY_TYPE = 'ORG' AND SS.DEFAULT_FLAG = 'Y') ) ORDER BY PRIORITY asc) tbl WHERE ROWNUM < 2
